1. Nf3 f6 2. Nd4 Nh6 3. e3 Ng4 4. f4 b5 5. Nf5 e5 6. Bd3

Note that, to prove atomic is a draw, we only need to look at one strong move for black at each black turn.
But we need to look at all the possible strong moves for white when it is white's turn.
  • 1. Nf3
    • 1 ... f6
      • 2. Nc3
        • 2 ... Nh6
      • 2. Nd4
        • 2 ... Nh6
          • 3. Nf5 Nxf5
          • 3. e3
            • 3 ... Ng4 4. f4
              • 4 ... b5
                • 5. Nf5
                  • 5 ... e5
                    • 6. Bd3
                    • 6. Ne7
                • 5. h3
                • 5. Bd3
          • 3. e4
          • 3. h3
          • 3. g4
          • 3. f3
      • 2. Ne5
      • 2. Na3
      • 2. d4
      • 2. e4
      • 2. e3
        • 2 ... d5
      • 2. c3

6. Bd3
